api.name: 修改店铺信息
api.note: 修改店铺信息
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"YYKtG9Dv","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"UPDATE shop
SET 
  customer_id = #{customer_id},
  customer_num = #{customer_num},
  shop_rate = CASE 
    WHEN shop_rate IS NULL OR shop_rate = 0 THEN #{shop_rate}
    ELSE shop_rate
  END,
  moreover_profit = CASE 
    WHEN moreover_profit IS NULL OR moreover_profit = 0 THEN #{moreover_profit}
    ELSE moreover_profit
  END,
  profit = CASE 
    WHEN profit IS NULL OR profit = 0 THEN #{profit}
    ELSE profit
  END,
  whether_take_pictures = CASE 
    WHEN whether_take_pictures IS NULL OR whether_take_pictures = '' OR whether_take_pictures = '0' THEN #{whether_take_pictures}
    ELSE whether_take_pictures
  END
WHERE id = #{id}","id":"ot1x0ZQv"}],"transaction":1}]

api.name: 根据登录的id获取任务详情
api.note: 根据登录的id获取任务详情
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"ukG1SAgu","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"SELECT
  id,
  order_id,
  queue_entry_time,
  iw_status,
  last_invoice_code,
  conductor_name
FROM task
WHERE
  -- ① 先做“今天日期”过滤（东八区）
  queue_entry_time LIKE CONCAT(
        '%',
        DATE_FORMAT(
          CONVERT_TZ(NOW(), @@session.time_zone, '+08:00'),
          '%c月%e日'                           -- 例：5月23日
        ),
        '%'
      )
  -- ② 再判断 conductor
  AND (
        #{conductor} = '1'        -- 如果传 1 → 不限制人员
        OR conductor = #{conductor}  -- 其他值 → 只取本人
      );","id":"Ef1FbqIZ"}],"transaction":0}]

api.name: IW任务状态-报错反馈

[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"ukG1SAgu","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"SELECT GET_LOCK(CONCAT('invoice_', #{invoice_id}), 10) as lock_result;","id":"WtRe1D9Y"},{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"UPDATE checkordertask
SET status = '已完成'
WHERE invoice_id = #{invoice_id};","id":"dvBR3tQ3"},{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"UPDATE task
SET iw_status = CONCAT('运行结束-', #{error})
WHERE id = #{invoice_id}
  AND iw_status IN ('首次运行-运行中', '二次运行-运行中')
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM checkordertask
    WHERE invoice_id = #{invoice_id} AND status != '已完成'
  );","id":"pfk8inzz"},{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"SELECT RELEASE_LOCK(CONCAT('invoice_', #{invoice_id})) as release_result;","id":"8l_p81rS"}],"transaction":0}]

api.name: 获取每个订单是否提交了【采购】的任务
api.note: 获取每个订单是否提交了【采购】的任务
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"ukG1SAgu","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"SELECT 
    JSON_OBJECTAGG(input_list.check_order_id, 
        CASE 
            WHEN t.order_id IS NOT NULL THEN '是' 
            ELSE '否' 
        END
    ) AS result_dict
FROM (
<foreach collection="orderIdList" item="orderId" separator=" UNION ALL ">
    SELECT #{orderId} AS check_order_id</foreach>
) AS input_list
LEFT JOIN transfer_order_task t ON input_list.check_order_id = t.order_id","id":"KNUvhwAe"}],"transaction":0}]

api.name: 修改任务状态
api.note: 修改任务状态
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"ukG1SAgu","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"SELECT GET_LOCK(CONCAT('invoice_', #{invoice_id}), 10) as lock_result;","id":"XvCaqny2"},{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"UPDATE checkordertask
SET status = '已完成'
WHERE order_id = #{order_id};","id":"GTpTJ86m"},{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"UPDATE task
SET iw_status = CASE 
    WHEN iw_status = '首次运行-运行中' THEN '首次运行-运行结束'
    WHEN iw_status = '二次运行-运行中' THEN '二次运行-运行结束'
END
WHERE id = #{invoice_id}
  AND (iw_status = '首次运行-运行中' OR iw_status = '二次运行-运行中')
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM checkordertask
    WHERE invoice_id = #{invoice_id} AND status != '已完成'
  );","id":"ed3uuKzC"},{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"SELECT RELEASE_LOCK(CONCAT('invoice_', #{invoice_id})) as release_result;","id":"lJoJEqP-"}],"transaction":1}]

api.name: 新增创建SKU分配任务
api.note: 新增创建SKU分配任务
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"q45gsAZj","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"INSERT INTO task_dispatch (
  order_id,
  invoice_id,
  shop_type,
  task_status,
  assignment_round
)
/* 把列表 orderList 展开成多行 */
VALUES
<foreach collection="orderList" item="oid" separator=",">
  ( #{oid},
    #{invoice_id},
    #{shop_type},
    #{task_status},
    #{assignment_round}
  )
</foreach>
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE            -- ← 若 order_id 已存在，则执行下面的覆盖
  invoice_id        = VALUES(invoice_id),
  shop_type         = VALUES(shop_type),
  task_status       = VALUES(task_status),
  assignment_round  = VALUES(assignment_round);
","id":"4JVWQXa5"}],"transaction":0}]

api.name: 获取采购单付款任务的状态
api.note: 获取采购单付款任务的状态

api.name: 根据采购单iw的采购单ID获取订单详情
api.note: 根据采购单iw获取订单详情
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"ukG1SAgu","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"WITH task_data AS (
    SELECT iw_status, order_id
    FROM task
    WHERE id = #{invoice_id}
    LIMIT 1
),
order_id_list AS (
    SELECT
        TRIM(val) AS order_id
    FROM task_data,
         JSON_TABLE(
             CONCAT('["', REPLACE(task_data.order_id, ',', '","'), '"]'),
             '$[*]' COLUMNS(val VARCHAR(255) PATH '$')
         ) AS jt
)
SELECT
    t.iw_status,
    d.*
FROM order_id_list o
JOIN order_details d ON d.order_id = o.order_id
JOIN task_data t ON 1=1;","id":"vxSOlkbu"}],"transaction":0}]

api.name: 获取下单任务
api.note: 获取下单任务
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"ukG1SAgu","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"UPDATE place_order_task 
SET executor_name = CONCAT('处理中_', UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW(3)))
WHERE id = (
    SELECT temp.id FROM (
        SELECT id 
        FROM place_order_task 
        WHERE executor_name = '等待中' 
        ORDER BY created_at ASC, id ASC
        LIMIT 1
    ) AS temp
)","id":"zx0c2eAF"},{"id":"6zL5VAD8","sqlText":"SELECT purchaseOrderId 
FROM place_order_task 
WHERE executor_name LIKE '处理中_%' 
ORDER BY created_at ASC, id ASC
LIMIT 1","transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null},{"id":"4OsLXTrJ","sqlText":"UPDATE place_order_task 
SET executor_name = '处理中'
WHERE executor_name LIKE '处理中_%'","transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null}],"transaction":1}]

[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"q45gsAZj","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"SELECT
  invoice_id,
  order_id,
  queue_entry_time,
  task_status,
  intention_code
FROM task
WHERE
  -- ① 先做“今天日期”过滤（东八区）
  queue_entry_time LIKE CONCAT(
        '%',
        DATE_FORMAT(
          CONVERT_TZ(NOW(), @@session.time_zone, '+08:00'),
          '%c月%e日'                           -- 例：5月23日
        ),
        '%'
      )
  -- ② 再判断 conductor
  AND (
        #{conductor} = '1'        -- 如果传 1 → 不限制人员
        OR conductor = #{conductor}  -- 其他值 → 只取本人
      );","id":"2fM-FwUB"}],"transaction":0}]

api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"ukG1SAgu","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"INSERT INTO checkordertask (
  order_id,       -- 主键
  status,
  batch,
  invoice_id
) VALUES (
  #{order_id},
  #{status},
  #{batch},
  #{invoice_id}
)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE         -- 若 order_id 已存在，则执行覆盖
  status     = VALUES(status),
  batch      = VALUES(batch),
  invoice_id = VALUES(invoice_id);","id":"2rWOo9OG"}],"transaction":0}]

api.name: 获取发票当前状态
api.note: 获取发票当前状态
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"sqlList":[{"id":"10MWgoRB","sqlText":"SELECT CAST(status AS CHAR) AS status
FROM purpose_ticket
WHERE id = #{id}

api.task: [{"taskType":1,"sqlList":[{"id":"DuUAOLMp","sqlText":"SELECT status FROM last_invoices WHERE id = #{id}","transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null}],"transaction":0,"datasourceId":"YYKtG9Dv"}]

api.name: 获取采购单任务
api.note: 获取采购单任务
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"YYKtG9Dv","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"SELECT @target_id := (
  SELECT id
  FROM last_invoices
  WHERE status = 1 
    AND conductor IS NOT NULL          -- 排除NULL
    AND conductor != ''                 -- 排除空字符串
    AND conductor NOT LIKE '%-%-%'
  ORDER BY id ASC
  LIMIT 1
);","id":"FX0XYa5O"},{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"UPDATE last_invoices
SET status = 2
WHERE id = @target_id
  AND status = 1;","id":"zXZzdKEp"},{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"SELECT 
  id,
  last_invoice_code,
  conductor,
  related_orders,
  shop_id,
  ROW_COUNT() as update_count
FROM last_invoices
WHERE id = @target_id
  AND @target_id IS NOT NULL;","id":"7MarZkDl"}],"transaction":1}]

api.name: 获取反馈和发票状态
api.note: 获取反馈和发票状态
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"YYKtG9Dv","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"/* 先锁定  purpose_ticket，再左联  purpose_ticket_feedbacks
   —— 即使没有任何反馈记录，也能拿到 status */
SELECT
  f.user_name,
  f.info,
  f.create_time,
  CAST(p.status AS CHAR) AS status
FROM  purpose_ticket            AS p
LEFT JOIN purpose_ticket_feedbacks AS f
       ON f.intention_id = p.id          /* 只有这儿放在 ON 条件里才能保留空行 */
WHERE p.id = #{intention_id}             /* 只按发票 ID 过滤，不再用 f.intention_id */
ORDER BY f.create_time ASC;              /* 如无排序需求可删除 */
","id":"oXWiFdbN"}],"transaction":0}]

api.name: 根据报价单ID删除报价单
api.note: 根据报价单ID删除报价单
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"sqlList":[{"id":"vXOxVTz_","sqlText":"DELETE FROM product_quotation 
WHERE shop_num = SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX('${inputString}', '～', 1), '～', -1)
  AND JSON_CONTAINS(customer_english_title, JSON_EXTRACT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX('${inputString}', '～', 2), '～', -1), '$[0]'))
  AND nation = SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX('${inputString}', '～', 3), '～', -1)
  AND JSON_CONTAINS(num, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX('${inputString}', '～', 4), '～', -1))","transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null}],"transaction":1,"datasourceId":"YYKtG9Dv"}]

api.name: 新增list，检查配对任务
api.note: 新增list，检查配对任务
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"ukG1SAgu","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"-- 先查询是否有冲突的记录
SELECT order_id, status 
FROM checkordertask 
WHERE order_id IN (
<foreach collection="orderid_list" item="orderId" separator=",">
#{orderId}
</foreach>
) AND status IN ('等待中', '运行中')","id":"ICanoSaV"},{"id":"rigxeT6P","sqlText":"INSERT INTO checkordertask (order_id, status, batch, invoice_id) VALUES
<foreach collection="orderid_list" item="orderId" separator=",">
(#{orderId}, '等待中', '二次', #{invoice_id})
</foreach>
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE 
status = CASE 
    WHEN status = '已完成' THEN '等待中'
    ELSE status
END","transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null}],"transaction":1}]

api.name: 根据订单号回传上传手工单任务的状态值

api.name: 修改任务块状态
api.note: 修改任务块状态
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"q45gsAZj","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"UPDATE task t
JOIN (
        SELECT
            td.invoice_id AS invoice_id,
            MAX(
                CASE td.assignment_round
                    WHEN '二次' THEN 2
                    WHEN '首次' THEN 1
                    ELSE 0
                END
            ) AS round_flag
        FROM task_dispatch td
        GROUP BY td.invoice_id
        HAVING SUM(td.task_status != '已完成') = 0
     ) x
  ON x.invoice_id = t.invoice_id
/* 只有当前 task_status 已包含 “首次运行” 或 “创建SKU” 才允许更新 */
SET t.task_status = CASE x.round_flag
                       WHEN 1 THEN '运行结束-首次运行'
                       WHEN 2 THEN '运行结束-创建SKU'
                       ELSE t.task_status            -- 其余轮次保持原值
                    END
WHERE t.task_status LIKE '%首次运行%' 
   OR t.task_status LIKE '%创建SKU%';","id":"hvz-1Zoa"}],"transaction":0}]

  invoice_id,
  order_id,
  intention_code,
  conductor,
  conductor_name,        -- ★ 新增列
  queue_entry_time,
  task_status
) VALUES (
  #{invoice_id},
  #{order_id},
  #{intention_code},
  #{conductor},
  #{conductor_name},      -- ★ 新增值
  #{queue_entry_time},
  #{task_status}
)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
  order_id         = #{order_id},
  intention_code   = #{intention_code},
  conductor        = #{conductor},
  conductor_name   = #{conductor_name},   -- ★ 同步覆盖
  queue_entry_time = #{queue_entry_time},
  task_status      = #{task_status};","id":"ks3DMcE4"}],"transaction":0}]

api.name: 根据采购单ID获取采购单详情
api.note: 根据采购单ID获取采购单详情
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"ukG1SAgu","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"-- 修正XML转义后的完整SQL
SELECT pod.*
FROM purchase_order_detail pod
WHERE pod.create_time >= CONCAT(#{searchDate}, ' 00:00:00')
  AND pod.create_time < DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{searchDate}, ' 00:00:00'), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
  AND pod.dxm_po_number IN (
      SELECT DISTINCT sd.dxm_po_number
      FROM sku_data sd
      WHERE sd.created_at >= CONCAT(#{searchDate}, ' 00:00:00')
        AND sd.created_at < DATE_ADD(CONCAT(#{searchDate}, ' 00:00:00'), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
        AND sd.order_id IN (
            -- ⭐ 使用关联表，不再拆分字符串
            SELECT DISTINCT od.order_id
            FROM task_order_relation tor
            INNER JOIN order_details od 
                ON od.order_id = tor.order_id
                AND od.purchase_task = '是'
            WHERE tor.task_id = #{id}
        )
        AND sd.dxm_po_number IS NOT NULL
  )
LIMIT 5000;","id":"HVVFFk1z"}],"transaction":1}]

api.name: IW获取任务详情
api.note: IW获取任务详情
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"q45gsAZj","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"SELECT
    t.task_status,
    t.conductor_name,
    d.*
FROM task t
JOIN order_details d ON FIND_IN_SET(d.order_id, t.order_id) > 0
WHERE t.invoice_id = #{invoice_id}","id":"e5FjCrGj"}],"transaction":0}]

api.name: 新增或更新采购IW排班
api.note: 新增或更新采购IW排班
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"sqlList":[{"id":"_xh9WMjV","sqlText":"-- 删除在数据库中存在但不在传入列表中的员工记录
DELETE FROM task_assignment_record
WHERE DATE(record_date) = #{recordDate}
AND staff_name NOT IN
<foreach collection="staffNameList" item="name" open="(" separator="," close=")">
    #{name}
</foreach>","transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null},{"id":"Il3VEAcx","sqlText":"-- 插入传入列表中在数据库不存在的员工记录
INSERT INTO task_assignment_record (record_date, staff_name, task_count)
SELECT #{recordDate}, temp.staff_name_value, 0
FROM (
    <foreach collection="staffNameList" item="name" separator="UNION ALL">
        SELECT #{name} AS staff_name_value
    </foreach>
) AS temp
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM task_assignment_record
    WHERE DATE(record_date) = #{recordDate}
    AND staff_name = temp.staff_name_value
)","transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null}],"transaction":1,"datasourceId":"ukG1SAgu"}]

api.name: 根据店小秘SKU获取留言和备注
api.note: 根据店小秘SKU获取留言和备注
api.task:
[{"taskType":1,"datasourceId":"ukG1SAgu","sqlList":[{"transformPlugin":null,"transformPluginParam":null,"sqlText":"/* 返回 ali_buyer_word + purchase_remark 组成的字典 */
SELECT JSON_OBJECT(
         'ali_buyer_word',  ali_buyer_word,
         'purchase_remark', purchase_remark,
         'bargain_note', bargain_note
       ) AS remark_dict
FROM   sku_remark
WHERE  dxm_sku = #{dxm_sku}
LIMIT  1;","id":"6Q6IZd1m"}],"transaction":0}]
